title: Explosive: Chicago Tribune’s Perplexity AI Lawsuit Exposes Critical Copyright Battle
description: BitcoinWorldExplosive: Chicago Tribune’s Perplexity AI Lawsuit Exposes Critical Copyright BattleThe cryptocurrency world is no stranger to legal battles, but a new front has opened that could reshape how AI interacts with content—and potentially impact blockchain-based media projects. The Chicago Tribune’s lawsuit against Perplexity AI represents more than just another copyright case; it’s a watershed moment for AI search engines and their relationship with traditional [...]This post Explosive: Chicago Tribune’s Perplexity AI Lawsuit Exposes Critical Copyright Battle first appeared on BitcoinWorld.

title: EU hits Meta with antitrust probe over plans to block AI rivals from WhatsApp
description: EU Commission confirms probe into AI use on WhatsApp, marking latest action against Big Tech; Italy opened parallel probe earlier this yearThe post EU hits Meta with antitrust probe over plans to block AI rivals from WhatsApp appeared first on Profit by Pakistan Today.

title: Google.org backs ATF with $1m for AI talent
description: Google.org grants $1M to the African Technology Forum to develop AI talent in Africa, training over 10,000 students in Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, and SA.Read More: https://punchng.com/google-org-backs-atf-with-1m-for-ai-talent/

title: Some AI dangers are already real, DeepMind's Hassabis says
description: Some of the biggest dangers of AI, like attacks on infrastructure, are already real and need to be guarded against, Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis said at Axios' AI+ Summit in San Francisco Thursday.Why it matters: The race to develop AI is changing society in real time, generally for good —...
